entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -19.8°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: NW 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:29 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:29 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:29 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
